column4: hey! i fixed the DISPLAY ISSUE :D if anyone is having trouble with odd screensizes i may be able to help. I also have another question -- i disabled my wireless adapter to make sure i was using my cable but when i re-enabled it the network connection isn't present? i hope i don't have to add all the wireless net details as i don't know if i have them? is there another way?
| i am having problem with my display
if you disable a wireless driver and re-enable it it wipes the connection details is it possible to restore them?
what are you trying to do with the display?
